item.title: Your Employees' Sleep Problems Are Costing Your Business Time And Money
item.description:
Your Employees' Sleep Problems Are Costing Your Business Time And Money

Did you lose a day or two of work last year because you slept poorly the night before? You're far from alone, according to new results from the World Sleep Survey. The study, which was conducted by researchers at the University of Oxford in collaboration with U.K.-based health care company called Big Health, found that full-time employees in the U.S.

item.title: We Need To Get Ready To Feed 2 Billion More People: 2015 In Food
item.description:
We Need To Get Ready To Feed 2 Billion More People: 2015 In Food

By 2050, farming will have to change if the world is going to keep feeding itself. We've already passed peak chicken and peak milk. At the same time climate change keeps making it harder to grow food, two billion more people will need to eat.

item.title: Welcome to my world of expertise!
item.description:
Welcome to my world of expertise!

Expertise is vast yet selective.
